About.title: VVR Home Care
About.paragraph: We take this opportunity to introduce ourselves as VVR Home Care, company focusing on providing quality, high-end Home Care Solution & infrastructures. At VVR Home Care we recognize that each of our clients is unique and hence striveto develop a tailor-made solution for each of our clients. We believe that cuttingedge technology should be within the reach of any business regardless of size and wecan work within the constraints of a given budget to develop a solution.VVR Home Care Today provides highly Professional & Prompt Services in Your Home

Services.name: Washing Machine Repair
Services.text: Washing Machine repair - includes top load washing machine repair service, front load washing machine repair service, and fully automatic washing machine repair service

Services.name: Refrigerator Repair
Services.text: Doorstep repair service starts with checking functioning of Appliance using Start-Stop operation. Diagnosis cost for troubleshooting of the functional issue

Services.name: Air Conditioner Repair
Services.text: AC service (at home service) starts with checking the functioning of Appliance using Start-Stop operation. AC service also includes cleaning of Outdoor Unit Condensor coil using water to remove dust.

Services.name: Microwave Oven Repair
Services.text: If your microwave is relatively new and the repair costs less than replacing it, the fix is worth it. But are microwaves worth repairing if something major is broken? Probably not. Consider getting a replacement appliance for about $100, which should work for 7 to 10 years.

Services.name: Television Repair
Services.text: TV repair – includes LED TV repair, LCD TV repair, Smart TV repair, 4K TV repair, OLED or QLED TV repair, standalone TV screen repair.

Services.name: All Electrical Equipement Repair
Services.text: Electrical repairs involve a wide variety of services, ranging from major installation, or rewiring your home, to changing over a broken socket or breaker. It is often a difficult task to diagnose a particular electrical issue at home without the help of a trained professional.

Features.text: “A computer will do what you tell it to do, but that may be much different from what you had in mind. Just having satisfied customers isn't good enough anymore.”

Why.paragraph: Quality video evidence helps solve crime and increases apprehensions by private security and police agenciesSaves  money by identifying operational issues.Acts as a deterrent to those that would consider being dishonest.Video evidence often eliminates or significantly reduces exposure to litigation via fraudulent or frivolous claims.All too often businesses discover product or money missing weeks after the fact. Having video archives available to go back and review often solves these mysteries. Video analytics – let video help the operational side of your business by mapping customer patterns, counting people, capturing license plates and more.
